about.title: About Event Logic
about.ingress: Complete tool for everyone who procures, manages, and invites to meetings, events, and conferences
about.description: Event Logic is a complete platform that changes how you procure, organize, and plan your meetings, events, and conferences. Founded in 2013 in Gothenburg, Event Logic has developed into the obvious tool for meetings, events, and conferences. All management takes place directly in the user's personal event page in the platform, which means that everything related to the user's bookings is in one place, enabling full overview, easier management, time savings, and follow-up opportunities.

meeting_planners.title: For Meeting Planners
meeting_planners.description: Quickly and easily collect comparable quotes for your next meeting, event, or conference. With Event Logic, you can search among thousands of suppliers and request quotes with just a click.

buyers.title: For Buyers
buyers.description: By digitizing the entire process for meetings, events, and conferences, you can increase your efficiency while improving the user experience for your employees and partners. Get complete reporting and statistics on all your spending.

travel_agencies.title: For Business Travel Agencies
travel_agencies.description: Event Logic offers a complete solution for business travel agencies that want to digitize their event management process. From planning to invoicing, our platform helps you streamline your operations.

suppliers.title: For Suppliers
suppliers.description: Join thousands of suppliers in our database and get more business. It's free to be listed, and you only pay a small commission when you get a booking.

event_types.title: Event Logic for all types of events

step1.title: Plan your event
step1.description: Fill in the basic information and we'll give you a schedule suggestion based on your preferences. You can easily customize your event by adjusting times and details.

step2.title: Find suppliers
step2.description: Search among thousands of suppliers and easily request quotes with a button click.

step3.title: Compare quotes
step3.description: Suppliers' prices are displayed in a budget tab where you can easily compare prices for each part.

step4.title: Consider and book
step4.description: When you as a meeting booker have received quotes from suppliers, you can easily book the best option with a button.

step5.title: Invite participants
step5.description: Design your invitation and send it to participants. Customize a registration form with your own questions, send reminders, and share the participant list with suppliers.

step6.title: Changes and communication
step6.description: Update all changes and communicate with suppliers and agents in the platform.

testimonial1.text: Event Logic has simplified our event planning process significantly. We save both time and money by using this platform.
testimonial1.author: Maria Andersson, Event Manager

testimonial2.text: The ability to compare quotes side by side has helped us make better decisions and negotiate better deals with suppliers.
testimonial2.author: Johan Bergström, Procurement Manager

testimonial3.text: The participant management feature is a game-changer. It's so easy to send invitations and track responses.
testimonial3.author: Anna Lindberg, Marketing Director

help.title: How Event Logic can help you
help.description: Event Logic simplifies all management within meetings, events, and conferences. Our platform helps you plan your event, find suppliers, compare quotes, book, invite participants, and communicate with all stakeholders.
help.contact_text: Want to know more? Click and submit your information below and we'll be in touch!

event_coach.title: If you need support, use an Event Coach!
event_coach.description1: If you need support with your management, we recommend you to book an experienced Event Coach who can help you with parts or all of the project management and administration.
event_coach.description2: You can book an Event Coach directly in Event Logic, and together you'll estimate how many hours that may need.

seaRoom.title: Sea Room

about.title: About Our Restaurant
about.description1: At Wärds Restaurant in Mollösund, we offer a culinary experience focusing on local ingredients and seafood delicacies. Our menu varies with the seasons to always offer the freshest ingredients.
about.description2: With a view of Mollösund's charming harbor, you can enjoy good food and drinks in a relaxed and historic environment. Our kitchen combines traditional flavors with modern influences to create a unique dining experience.

events.title: Private Events
events.description: Even though our restaurant is closed for the season, we offer the possibility to book the entire restaurant for private events and parties.

options.title: Birthdays

options.title: Corporate Events

questions.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
questions.answer: Check-in from 3:00 PM. Check-out by 11:00 AM.

questions.question: Is breakfast included in the room price?
questions.answer: Yes, all room rates include breakfast.

questions.question: Is there parking available?
questions.answer: Yes, there is parking near the inn.

questions.question: Are pets allowed?
questions.answer: Yes, in certain rooms. Please inform us in advance if you plan to bring pets. An additional fee may apply.

booking.title: Book Your Stay
booking.subtitle: Stay in a piece of living history at Mollösunds Wärdshus
booking.intro: Reserve your stay at historic Mollösunds Wärdshus, where each room has its own character and story. Our booking system allows you to check availability, compare room types, and secure your stay with instant confirmation.

standard.title: Fisherman's Quarters
standard.description: Cozy, comfortable rooms reminiscent of the simple quarters where fishermen once rested between voyages, updated with modern amenities.

deluxe.title: Captain's Cabin
deluxe.description: Spacious rooms with traditional touches and partial sea views, offering the comfort a ship's captain would have expected when coming ashore.

suite.title: Harbormaster's Suite
suite.description: Our finest accommodations with separate living areas and panoramic ocean views, named for those who once oversaw Mollösund's bustling harbor.

policies.title: Booking Policies
policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before arrival
policies.pets: Pet-friendly rooms available (additional fee may apply)

questions.question: Is breakfast included?
